definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: appar. distance, only in the phr. [[ארץ]]([[ה]])[[כִּבְרַת ]] a distance of land or length of way, Ge 35:16 [[לָכוֹא אֶפְרָתָה]] ´[[ה]] ´[[וַיְהִי עוֹד כ]], Ge 48:7 [[לָבאׁ אֶפְרָתָה]] ´[[א]] ´[[בְּעוֹד כ]], 2Ki 5:19 [[אָָרֶץ]] ´[[וַיֵּלֶח מֵאִתּוֹ כ]]. The distance meant is uncertain, but fr. 2Ki 5:19 it would seem to have been a short one; v. further Di:Ge 35:16 and Thes (As. kibrâti is a (widely extended) territory, quarter of the world, etc., Dl:HWB 315; according to Hoffm.:GGAbh. xxxvi (1890), 23–25 perhaps the distance that one can see).
